channel.title: Alot of things I need help on
channel.description:
OK, here's what I wish to do.
I want to change my character's stats and change its players rights to the owner. How do I do that, and then save it so it'll take affect on my server? I change the things, save, and then Compile it?
Secondly, I want to add new commands, and then save them so it'll take affect on my server. How do I do that?
Thirdly... how do I save my progress (or server status in your guys's case)????[br][size=1]Posted on: September 22, 2007, 08:28:45 PM[/size][hr]Anyone?... :|
